column5: passed from this life into his heavenly life on june 8
column6: 2015. a visitation for roger will be held friday
column8: 2015 from 6:00-8:00p. m. and a chapel service will be held june 13
column11: at sanders funeral home with rev. dorman duggan officiating. graveside services will be held monday
column15: in frisco at ridgeview west memorial park. roger was born october 17
column16: 1941 in lubbock to parents jewell and marvin munn. he was raised in tahoka and denver city
column17: graduated from denver city high school and attended texas tech. roger worked as a meat processor for over 44 years. on october 26
column19: roger married sondra brumley in hereford
column20: tx. he is survived by sondra munn
column21: his wife of 52 years; daughter gina albers and husband mike; daughter marisa rycroft and husband william; grandchildren kendal white
column22: morgan and taylor rycroft; as well as many nieces and nephews. preceded in death were parents jewell and marvin munn
column23: brother sargent j. munn and nephew neal munn. upcoming events. visitationjun 12. 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm sanders funeral home1420 main street. lubbock
